speak;Tana;Father Moulder...|Look at the beauty of the ocean...|Oh, how I miss Frelia...|Do you miss Frelia as much as I do, Father Moulder?
speak;Moulder;The sea winds of our homeland are not easily forgotten, Princess.
speak;Tana;I can almost smell the salt from our coastline...|The morning mists over Castle Frelia....
speak;Moulder;Our kingdom may be far, but our hearts remain close to home.
speak;Tana;I wonder how Innes is managing...|I hope he is doing ok...|I bet he must be worried about our people as well.
speak;Moulder;Prince Innes is strong.|He understands our duty extends beyond our shores.
speak;Tana;That is true...|If there is anyone who can handle himself, it's my brother.|That aside, Princess Eirika needs us now!|Our friendship means more than our homesickness.
speak;Moulder;Precisely!|The bonds of friendship transcend borders.
expression;Tana;Smile
speak;Tana;Though I must admit...|Sometimes, I dream of the lighthouse at Frelia's southern coast...|The way the waves crash against the rocks...
speak;Moulder;Ho ho ho!|Your imagination is as vivid as ever, Princess.
speak;Tana;But we're making a difference here!|Helping our friends is more important than missing home.
speak;Moulder;Your spirit gives me hope.|Princess Eirika is fortunate to have such loyal allies.|I feel like she could reunite all of Magvel, given enough time.
